## foundationAgEditableRenderer variable

A function that returns a Foundation Editable Renderer registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem.

**Signature:**

```typescript
foundationAgEditableRenderer: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<EditableRenderer, any>;
}>) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<EditableRenderer, any>;
}, typeof EditableRenderer>
```

## Remarks

HTML Element: &lt;foundation-editable-renderer&gt;
